content.detailedDescription: I took my girlfriend for a romatic walk up a path on cheyenne mountian, west of colorado springs. this walk was shorlty after i was released from active duty us army. it was full dark and warm so i am assuming it was august or september 1991. it was full dark, there fore the time must have been 9:00pm or later. we sat and looked at the lights of colorado springs when i noticed a pair of lights moving from west to east. the night was clear and the stars were clear from the mountian side. however the lights i seen travelling were surounded by a "halo" that conected to long tails. the brightest was in front of the dimmer, however they apeared to be close in proximity. the best discription of the spots would be a colon with the lower dot a half space behind the top dot and half as bright. the striking feature was the long tail attached to the aura surounding the lights. they traveled at a constant speed across the sky without any visible aircraft around. my girlfriend was short sighted and did not have her glasses with her at the time. she could not see what i was trying to describe to her. there were remarkable details of the objects i witnessed. first was the slight fuzzyness of the lights compared to the crisp stars that night. second was the halo or aura that trailed into a tail. third was the lenght of the tail. the shooting stars i have seen did not have tails half as long as the objects i witnessed in 1991. please note the attached picture released from project blue book and published in the dailymail.Com website that illistrates exactly of the objects i viewed in colorado springs. the only notable difference is there was a second, smaller and dimmer object immeadiatly lower and behind the upper light. as viewed from my perspective, the upper light was in front of the lower light. therefore the upper light was travelling infront of and above the other light. their travel was from west to east in a straight line. no sound was emmitted and the speed and illuminosity remained constant. the night was clear of cloud cover and stars and airplanes were distinct in appearance. and yes, i know that cheyenne mountian contains one of the most secret military installations in the world.
content.summary: Viewed two objects that had aura and tail traveling west to east. observed from cheyenne mountian, colorado springs, coin 1991.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside to my backyard with my dog. the brightness caught my eye and noticed two commercial airliners flying in the area. i first thought it was a star but i then noticed an airplanes lights fly behind the "star". my phone temporarily froze and afterward took a picture. i was going to record when it vanished.
content.summary: Hovering ball in direction of baltimore washington international

content.detailedDescription:
I was visisting the back yard of my family. i walked up an spotted this strange jelly fish like object. called all family members to come watch. i snapped a picture with my phone but its not as clear as what we saw in person.

it then dissapeared. it was fairly high, what makes me think thst it must have been a fairly large object.

there is something very strange and unexplainable. it the second time i spotted a ufo in a short period of time. last was around november 30, 2014 same spot. different style objects.

i was excited to experience this creature. it was something very unique.
content.summary: Flying jelly fish

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving work when i saw three bright lights arranged in a triangle, it was still light enough that i could a faint black triangle behind the three lights. the object then slowly moved left (nw direction) then stopped, and sped off in the ne direction. when it sped off it was high enough that it was above the buildings downtown. unfortunately i lost sight of it when it flew over downtown and i didn't have enough time to take a photo/video.
content.summary: Three bright lights - didn't blink - moved nw slightly then sped off ne

content.detailedDescription: I was in the cvs parking lot.The front of my car facing briton plaza. across the street was a taco bell, and a dunkin donuts. i was waiting there for my mother to get back into the car and i notice a shooting star. it was red and orange. but the star did not shoot across the sky. it was like a slow motion shooting star. leaving a stream of orange and red behinde it. then the stream disapeared and the star-like object began to move horizontally what looked like way above the publix in the britton plaza. the starlike object was several feet above and even above an actual planet then it descended almost like it was rocking back and forth downwards until it was below it. by this time my niece and i were both watching it very intrigued. we both made wishes assuming it was a shooting star but realizes its a much stranger thing and then the light just dissapeared out of no where. we got out of the car and waited to see if the light would appear again and to rule out the possibility of it being a plane but the light never showed again.
content.summary: Looked like a shooting star in slow motion, stopped over a building descended downwards and then disapeared

content.detailedDescription: On 01/17/2015 at exactly 5:09 pm. i observed an object in the evening sky. i was driving home from chicago il to bloomington il with my daughter. as i was driving down i-55 i had notice the object. i thought it was a airplane at first, however, the more i drove down the high way more i notice that the object looked like it was in a kind of orbit. i started to notice that the object remained on the right side of the road as i was driving by plainfield il. when i would bank the car left or right as the road would direct was the only time the object would appear that it move. if i went left the more the object would remain to my right. if i turn right or veer right the more the object would appear it was moving left. as i passed kankakee il the object was to my southwest at my 1 or 2 o'clock. the object was very high in the shy. at his point i could notice that the lights did not blink. the light's sort of shimmered every now and then. the did not blink like an airplane. i know the difference. i am an retired marine and i spent my time in service in aviation management as an aviation supply chain specialist. i asked my daughter who is 19 years old if she thought the lights were blinking and she said no. although she said she could barely make out the object and really wasn't paying attention. i thought the closer i got to getting home i could catch up to the object if it remained stationary. that is when i realized it was not stationary it was veering off the h south west. not fast, but faster than i could catch up to it. when i got close to bloomington il, about 36 miles out. i notice that it was lower on the horizon more like 3 or 4 o'clock and it was further away. it was like it was in orbit, but not so far it could have been a star. i know this because there was a star in the distance that appeared to be low in the sky and very faint. star became more visible as the evening turned to night. by the time we got home i could barely see the object in the night sky.
content.summary: Object look like a new grouping of stars in the evening sky, but was not.

content.detailedDescription: 12/10/2014, 3:15pm. i was on the road near medison (wisconsin), when i noticed a burning fireball like object in the sky. it flew slowly from east to west and ascended. i stopped my car and took a photo before it disappeared into the clouds. i heard the swishing sound of the object at this time. it was about 60-80(?) feet in diameter and fearsome.
content.summary: Burning fireball like object into the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was just chillin on the beach and a cylinder like shape came flying over the horizon. i thought it was like a middle or something man but the it just stopped. i made eye contact with like a lizard creature as it came out of the ufo. it jumped in the water, went for a quick swim that was startled by something. it jumped back in and they flew off back over the ocean it was very odd.
i'm scared man i'm never dojng drugs again now that's for sure. i don't have a picture but it looked like a velorapter mixed with a small human with short legs.
content.summary: I thought i was going to be raped

content.detailedDescription:
Mom was driving me home from a tutor lesson in bethany, oklahoma in 1970, 
i was 10 years old.  she drove west on 39th expressway also known as rt.66.
  
as we were coming up to council rd.  we noticed a big, bright light shimmering, right in front of us, not too high in the sky.  the light looked reflective, like it was reflecting the sun.
 
we both were questioning what in the world it could be.  the light shifted left, right then left, as if it  blinked off for a split second and back on in a different place in the sky.

mom then turned south onto overholser drive.  i remember yelling out for her to "pull over", she pulled off to the side of the road, the light that we saw was now a disc object hovering high to our left.
  
i pressed my face against the glass window and look up, we saw a huge dull metal colored disc.  it made no sound at all.  i was really scared and started crying.  i remember ducking down in the seat to hide.  i don't recall my mom saying anything after she turned off the road, i guess she was trying to process it all!
 
i cried for her to take us home!  we lived just a few short blocks away from where this happened.  she drove us home, our house backed up to overholser dr.  i ran to the backyard and looked down the street to see if i could see anything, it was gone.

we both told my sister and my dad what had happened, they both just laughed and made little green men jokes to us.

we have talked about it from time to time, over the years.  mom is now 85 years old and still remembers.  i'm 55 and will never forget what we saw that day.
content.summary: we noticed a bright, reflective light in the sky, it shifted directions two times then hovered above us!

content.detailedDescription:
I live in jersey city nj.I was in west virginia on vacation.When the incident occured.I was just taking pictures for a screen saver for my phone.I took a series of six pictures.The times which can inferred from the pictures.The orb was not visible with the naked eye.But once i looked at the pictures.I saw the object right away.

the reason i took so many pictures.Was because i wanted to have a group of pictures.So i could select the best for my screen saver.You can enhance the pictures.You can see a great deal worth of details on the object.There were no planes,helicopters, etc in the area.
content.summary: Hovering object

content.detailedDescription:
I though this was an interesting object caught on a samsung galaxy s3 while i was hiking around the top of cannon mtn.
i didn't see object while i was snapping photos. i only noticed it several days later.
object is slightly above the summit of lafayette mtn
content.summary: Object was caught while taking photos of franconia notch from top of cannon mtn.

content.detailedDescription: i was on vacation in the small village of kadawung, and we had about 10 friends sleep over at that night. at 5 in the morning, my cousin woke me up, and in indonesian said pesawat besar, meaning a big plane. he woke up another family member and we walked down this steep hill next to our house down to a stream. he pointed to the southwest and over the trees, coming towards us along the same direction of the river was a gigantic boomerang shaped object, it looked like a stealth bomber, but it was much, much larger. birds were coming from that direction and flying swiftly away from the craft. the craft had hundreds of lights on the bottom, the were in a patterned panel shape, and the colors rippling from  a bright point, where 2 smaller crafts came out and dropped down about 200 feet from the main point, and stopped suddenly, they did not have any lights, and were in a shape of a cube, than moving ahead of the main craft, disappeared into the trees. the craft than changed directions and moved slowly to the south. i ran back to the house by myself, where it was still visible. most of my family were awake because my uncles sheep were screaming and making lots of noise. we took 3 other younger members down to the stream right away, and the craft barely moved, and we sat there for the next 15 minutes, and saw 4 box objects return instead of 2. my cousins said no other boxed objects were released. the 4 objects came back to the same enter spot and disappeared inside the craft. after the craft disappeared behind a hill where trees were blocking the view. it was gone half an hour after we first saw it, we ran back to the house as fast as we could, scared half to death. later that evening, we were paralyzed with fear, and about 4:30, we went back to the same spot armed with knives, sharp branches and about half a pound of cherry bombs, m80s and other firecrackers. we hiked 300 yards towards the area where we saw the 4 boxes take off, and a strong smell of a chalky, brick like smell. the temperature rised when we got closer to where the smell was coming from. one of my cousins called me over and we found the soil was dry when everywhere else was wet, and had a yellow square spot. we found 3 similar spots, and in between the 3, i found a unusual australian coin, and when i tried to pick it up, it burned, and i found the side of the coin facing up was hot, and the side facing down was cool to the touch. over the next few days, i had some pimples, or even discoloration or even burns on my back that grew quickly, but faded after a week. the burned spots on the ground were gone the next day. a total of 13 people saw the craft, 4 neighbors, my grandparents, 3 cousins, and 3 other friends, as well as another family member, younger than me.
content.features: Dome, Window(s), Patterned Surface, Insignia, Wings, Other
content.summary: Huge, guessing over one mile wingspan, hundreds of lights, 2 small objects leading the way.

content.detailedDescription: We where driving home when the car started to stall a bit and when we got to the driveway i got out of the car when i heard a loud humming and aircraft noises, and when i looked up i saw a airplane flying very low to the ground and was fling in an eastern direction when i walked in to the street to get a better view i saw blimp like shape that appeared to be following the airplane. the airplane seemed to be following the airplane, and when the airplane disappeared over the tree line, the blimp appeared to rotate to face us and a red light turned on in the front and it started to blink and as the blinking occurred a buzzing sound pulsated in sequence. i started to get a throbbing headache that fell inline with the buzzing and then a spot light caught the craft and two jet airplanes flew down the road and the craft turned and took off with the jets in pursuit and soon a helicopter with a spot light followed the jets and that was all i saw. at first i was unsure of the blimp like craft until the jets and the helicopter chased it off so i figure that i should report it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Dull in color shrouded by light cloud coverage

content.detailedDescription: I have been having a "dream" that occurs every 10 yrs starting at the age of 9. i have just turned 39 and it hasn't happened this year. i am more aware of it recently. i have experience of being woke up to a bright light in my bedroom window which urges me to wake up whoever is in the house with me and are unable wake up. the light follows me room to room and then i wake up cold in a different spot of the house. at age 9 i was living in the outskirts, age 19 i had just recently givin birth to my 1st born and the very night i returned to my home in the country it happened. then when i was 29 in the city. i'm not sure about alien abduction as i am in denial and don't consider myself to be 'special' in anyway except spiritually and not in the christian sense. i am wondering if this may be anything related to abduction because when i google my experiences there is nothing similar. (btw i also experience sleep paralysis in the vibrating way and dream often of flying or trying to balance my self in the air. i also see fuzzy staticky looking people in my mind when i fall ill.) thank you for your time.
content.summary: Bright light outside of windows following me through out house every 10 years.

content.detailedDescription:
The photo im sending you folks at mufon is 100 percent real these aircraft have been seen countless times and some real strange black robotic black triangle with orange yellow eyes these new black triangles hover over palm springs everyday i know this because one hovered 50 feet over my house in 2013 and i have learned their secrets and where they really hide and have proof of that fact these aircraft do not exist in the us arsenal known by americans, they are 100 percent silent and very real and very much alive they have side burners and rear after burner they can hover for hours then just zoom off did i mention they hover 100% silent i have dared the world to prove me wrong on youtube countless times i got zero challenges now i present this same challenge to the senior members of mufon please prove this photo or the aircraft fake ive been showing and telling the world about these aircraft very few have listened now i have proof they are real on two different videos years apart.
i have two videos and a clear hd photo
content.summary: Larrge glowing v shaped aircraft over mountain

content.detailedDescription: Awoke to see the roof of a friends house 20 houses from mine can see all the way down the street even tho its dark and the street lights are on looking out of a large window and everything has a red tint turned to my left and there was 4 ets (grays) one seemed mad that i was looking at him it gave his comrades an angry look and one began speaking to me (female voice)told me that everything is fine don't worry just relax and look out the window and i looked out and everything went black and that was it years later objects were removed from my body during the ordeal i am sure that although i didn't see other abductees i felt that i was not the only one there and was waiting for them to drop sumone else off
content.summary: Awoke to see my street from above middle of night yet can see perfectly everything had a red tint turned to see 4 ets that talked to me yet mouth never moved

content.detailedDescription: I was walking across the street and as i was looking both ways i happened to look up. and what do i see hovering in the sky a red light. so i immediately take my phone out while crossing the street and start recording. as i walk in stop and shop parking lot i ask a woman nearby if in fact i was looking at something or was it a figure of my imagination. so i asked asked her if that had looked like a plane because i didn't have my glasses she reply "oh no that's not a plane" i then asked her after two mins of it hovering was it moving she reply"yes it is moving". i kept recording and it began to move across the sky in what would look like a slow motion of hovering and flying. i then asked a gentleman who was leaving the grocery store if that had looked normal or like a plane his response was "looks like something the government created" i said yes because planes do not fly like that. it was lighting up randomly. ask we watch it flew across the sky and because to fly a straight pattern at an exceeding speed as if it had been a jet but didn't resemble one. once it flew over stop and shop i lost sight of it then back up in the parking lot and found that it had disappeared. i have seen things before but never in day time or ever with anyone. it has seem as if it had been watching us or waiting for us to notice it.
content.summary: It was a reddish pink light that hovered over the city as if it were watching

content.detailedDescription:
In july 2001 , i was fortunate enough to witness a very large u.F.O ,
at close range , for over an hour ...
i was out fishing one night , alone in my small sailboat . there was no moon , 
90% cloud cover , and an approaching thunderstorm , 50 km. away. 
drifting because of no wind , and reclining in the cockpit ,  at 2 a.M ,
i noticed in the sky, 10km. to my south , three solid , bright red lights in a 
triangular formation . they were separated by 200 metres ., and approaching
 my position at 15 knots , altitude 300 metres . as they came closer , i noticed
another three red lights following , 4 km. behind . this immediately got my 
attention , and looking around i saw two more sets of red lights , 
equi-distant and at 90 degrees to the others . i was between several small
islands , and can accurately report it's overall dimensions as being 5km.
across . 
as it slowly passed directly overhead , it's underside was illuminated from 
the lights of a nearby city , 40km. away . it was a massive disc , with turrets ,
antennae , and one very large , brilliant white spotlight in the middle.
it was making a quiet and low buzzing noise , and took 30 mins. to pass
overhead . as it moved to the north , i could plainly see  it was an 
upside down saucer shape .
i don't drink or do drugs , this is as real as it gets .
there was nothing in the media about it the next day , and it passed an
 international airport on it's way north ...
... and no it wasn't an r/c balloon swamp gas venus lantern disinfo thingy.
at 3:30 a.M , the daily commercial jets screamed overhead towards 
the airport , at 5000 feet , tiny and loud .
i am a very experienced seaman/bushman , and this is not my only
encounter .,( although the largest so far )
content.summary: 5 km. in diameter . approached at 20 knots. at night .Blocked sky when overhead. three red lights in triangle ,at four extremities. one white spotlight in centre

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside on my balcony for a smoke @ 2:15am 01/20/15 when noticed a bright light in the west.At first i thought it was a star.Then i saw it was blinking just green at first then it went to a light blue then back to green then white & so on. it also had  red lights on the top & bottom.I came back inside to get my binoculars that is when i noticed it had a cylindrical shape.The sighting lasted about 25 min.The ufo may have stayed in the sky longer ,but i had to go back inside do to the cold it was -18c with a wind chill of -27c.             

  sincerely [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Cylinder shaped.Pulsating white green blue & red lights

content.detailedDescription: First about 8-830 my tv got extremely loud for no apparent reason and sounded kinda statically with voices like interference.  lasted about 30 seconds and me and my husband just looked at each other.  the tv turned back to normal like nothing happened and the picture was clear the whole time just the voice was different and loud, like the volume turned up all the way on its own and had a different channels voice going, female i think.  well my husband left and i went to get something to eat and did not see any lights were i seen them yesterday as i went down the street. when i turned east onto the main drag i seen a flickering light in the clouds that looked faint.  after the clouds cleared it got brighter and was aligned up with the road pretty much well i pilled over to take a video and it dimmed and i didn't see it again.  after waiting a few minutes i left and headed east again towards a food joint when i seen it flickering faintly  but now t was a lil north of the road.  well i proceeded to find a dark spot to take a video and it dimmed and i couldn't see it anymore.  so i turned south to get on the main drag and seen it infront of me so i pulled over and was able to get a video this time.  it was just above a single story building but further back.  as i was taping i thought it was moving but my camera must have wavered while i was filming it.  so i stopped to head home and headed west then turned south onto my street and i seen another multicolored flickering light that was just west of the road about 80 feet, so i pulled into the church parking lot and faced south and started filming this one as well.  same one from a few minutes ago i don't know.  well i got back into the car and turned south onto my street and noticed that the multicolored flickering light was now directly in line with my street instead of to the west of it a few seconds ago.  i go a couple blocks to my house and start to take another video of it and called my daughter and her boyfriend out to look at it.  well i finished filming and went inside to look at them.  i noticed that they all from the last 4 days have one single white flashing light either above it or below it either flickering faster than the big light or just a short glimp of a light.  they all had that in common.
content.summary: Seen multicolored light 4 days in a row

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and i where in bed, looking up through skylight when this bright white light flew over head very fast the light was bright hurt our eyes as it went over head, was a clear narrow triangle shape. no sound just a very bright white light. by the time i stood up and looked out the window the light had gone the event only lasted for 1-2min max.

flew in a straight line over the heads of the houses couldn't judge height of the object or its distant as it was a cold morning not much in the sky apart from some stars.
content.summary: Bright white light moving very fast

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1:17 am central time, early tuesday morning 1/20/15, i observed a green fireball while looking to the wsw from my vantage point in south lincoln, ne. a streak of white light, then a brilliant green before it vanished. the downward angle was a little less than 45 degrees. i was looking over a neighbor's garage roof line and if the slant of the roof was 45 degrees, the "line" the falling object made was less than that. it appeared to be falling from a south to north direction (although that is a guess). very fast; it was over before one could say "one thousand one."
content.summary: Falling streak of light that turned a brilliant green

content.detailedDescription: I am not sure on the exact date or time but i know it was a nice, clear warm night of fall in 2014. it was already dark out between 9pm- 10pm. so i had decided to take a bike ride with a family member, so about 3 blocks away from my house we then biked up to the park which happened to be at the side of us. there was a church on the same block and some trees and we decided to stop and take a break. but she then asked me what that light was in the sky, so i turned around and looked. we both sat there on our bikes and stared watching this big orangy glowing orb that seemed to fly just a bit higher then the trees about a block away or less. the orb moved in a straight path like it was slowly coming in our direction, we watched it for about 4 mins. it had no sound or anything. the object then looked like it ascended over the church and up higher where it then faded into a disappearance. we then waited to see is the object would have come back but we didn't see anything. we biked to the church to see if there was anything but nothing. after about half an hour there was no more activity.
content.summary: Orange glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside to my driveway. i looked up to see orion. (ne) 75 degrees. time approximately 6:04 there it was being obviously the brightest object in the night sky. very bright. blueish and white. it fluttered as if it would get even bigger and brighter but instead in 3 seconds it faded to nothing. smoothly. total viewed time 8 - 10 seconds. could of been there longer, i did not witness it appear. at its brightest the size of a nickle. it was stationary the whole time. at first i thought it could be a fireball, than possibly the iss space station. but than i have witnessed both of those before and easily discounted those possibilities.This was bigger and brighter. it was an explosion in space or either it was a supernova. i never lost sight of it as i waited for 2 or 3 more minutes in case it occurred again. i believed for another few seconds it was a very very faint looking star,very faint, than nothing. my best guess based on everything i've seen and all i know. i would say it was an explosion in near earth space. it most definitely was viewed by others. how i feel about it is it wasnt the first time and it wont be the last. i bet if i get some gen 3 nightvision the whole night sky would come alive.
content.summary: Like a supernova or explosion in 3 seconds it faded to a faint star than gone.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my 2 sister were playing ball in the backyard in the evening,i was like 4 and my sisters were older, when i noticed a large white glowing paper airplane like object gliding through the air at a constant height approximately 50 feet with no variance in speed, and no noise. it was flying above the dirt field at the elementary school behind our house. it kept flying back and forth from south to north and north to south at a leisurely slow speed. i pointed it out to my sisters and they oohed and we went back to playing catch with a big bouncy ball, as we did not know what it was. i then noticed the object again appearing almost out of no where in our back yard as if it had landed magically just behind my sisters, i then pointed behind them and shouted look, and they screamed and we all ran into the garage via the back door, adjacent to the house. me and my eldest sister ran more quickly and decided to mess with our other sister and shut the door and lock her out, she pounded on the door and screamed let me in, let me in for a good 30 seconds before we let her in. i remember immediately looking out the window to the back yard when inside the house, and the object was gone. we were all huffing and puffing telling our parents that we saw something. me and my eldest sister did not remember the event until after a period of 3 to 4 years, but my other sister who we locked out has no memory of the event. the object had no windows, no insignia, no letters just a pasty white glowing almost luminous quality, the outline of the object was almost hard to define because of its glow but it was angular in appearance.
content.summary: Me & my sisters playing ball in backyard that backs up to elementary school craft appeared as white glowing paper airplane almost luminous traveling back & forth from south to north and north in straight line before suddenly appearing in backyard

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv on my own when i heard what sounded like a low down aircraft so i decided to take a look outside and see what it was, assuming it was probably just a plane. what i saw instead was a black triangle. it has 4 lights in total from what i could see, 3 small white ones near each corner and a bigger red one in the middle. throughout the time period of about an hour more of these crafts flew past, in total it was about 9. there was also one very strange craft that flew past, bigger than the black triangles. it was orange and looked as if it was made out of glass. it looked like 3 ovals all connected. later that night when i went to bed i kept waking up in the air, i had passed through my wall and was in some kind of beam heading towards the centre of the craft. when i realised what was happening i would get instantly terrified and wake up in my bed. it could have just been a dream, if it hadn't have happened 6 times. later that month after not seeing anything else since i woke up from a flash of light flailing my arms completely terrified, covered in sweat and all i remember was seeing a female's head-shape and hair length, no facial features or torso. i now had 3 scratches on my stomach that weren't that the night i went to bed, i also had a white, shiny powder on my knee that wasn't there previously. a few months after this event i woke up with a tall, white alien inches away from my face. my instant reaction was of course complete fear. but what was really strange is that within less than a second i was completely relaxed. while i was laid there i felt what i can only describe as an elctro-magnetic sensation in my brain, what it was i have no idea. there was more of these aliens in the room, which i presume was their craft, i'm not sure what they were doing exactly, they were both at separate stations standing, working on something. the one in my face was still looking at me as my eyes starting to close on their own. i couldn't move during any of this, and i made no attempt to talk, it all happened quite fast and i was in shock. when my eyes closed i woke up in my bed, perhaps not immediately but some time later. the first time i saw the crafts i took a video, but after they tried to take me multiple times that same night, i thought maybe they will leave me alone if i delete the evidence, which didn't happen. before i woke up with the alien looking at me i was having what i think was a dream but it also felt like it might been controlled. i was at some kind of college dorm, i went in to a room and sat down and a woman who was very appealing to me started asking me questions, the only questions i remember very well is 'are you relaxed?' i remember this well because she asked me twice, when i finally responded with 'yes' everything went black, that's when i woke up with the alien staring at me. the aliens i saw were tall, white and thin. they looked somewhat liked the stereotypical grey aliens look like that you'd see in movies, except for the features i previously mentioned and that they had a line or a bump at the top middle of their head. they had no noticeable nose or ears, and a tiny slit mouth. i don't think they tried communicating with me during any of the time i was looking at them but a month after that event i heard a long beep in my left ear followed by what i can only describe as a strange alien language, now the word means nothing to me but it sounded like 'baxzor'. i apologise if i've left anything out but it's 06:26am here and i don't sleep at night any more because that's the only time it happens, so it about bedtime for me.
content.summary: Multiple black triangkes, 1 larger orange craft

content.detailedDescription:
It was october 27, 1976 at 2 a.M. in hagerman, idaho i was driving home with my wife when i looked out the side window and first seen a hovering object in a shape of a tear drop to the east, it had pulsating lights of red, orange, green, blue, and white. i stopped and turned off my rig and i cranked my 9 power hunting scope on my rifle and observed this object for around 15 minutes, through the pickup window. i seen an orb shaped like a round head light coming in from the north simultaneously i seen another orb come in from the south. they both entered my scope pattern at the same time as i was watching the mother ship the orbs went underneath the mother ship and disappeared into it. with in seconds the entire object with it's orbs shot straight up and out of sight, never to be seen again by me or my wife.
this same year we were having cattle mutilations all over southern idaho.
on january 16,2015 i was watching the program ufo hunters. there was a iranian pilot in iran in 1976 that seen the same thing as i did . i would like to know if any one else has seen the same thing as me and the iranian pilot in iran on october 27,1976?
feel free to call me. thank you.
 sincerely,
             [name removed/cms/tg]]
            bliss, idaho

p.S. i did not ever report this to any one.
content.summary: Tear shape pulsating lights suspended w/ two orbs one of north other south, entered tear and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a picture of the sun shinning off the clouds flying from vancouver to calgary and snapped a few when i looked at them afterwords i saw this object. in the first pic nothing, next pic it appears in the bottom right hand side, in the 2nd and 3rd pic it is right in the circle where the sun is shinning on the cloud. i did not see the object till looking at the pictures.
content.summary: Seemed to come out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were driving home from a convention. i looked out the car window to my right and saw what first looked like a long, metallic blimp swooping near us toward the ground. it was moving about as fast as an airplane but was dead silent. i shrieked and pointed it out to my husband, who was driving. structurally, it resembled a blimp but was long and narrow enough to be considered a cigar shaped ufo. i looked online to see if there are any military (or civilian) aircraft that resemble it and also asked my father, who was a pilot for years and is also an amateur astronomer. the closest thing i could find was a half-scale model of an airship that will be tested by the military in 2016 but to my knowledge hasn't been flown yet and is still being constructed.

at the tail of the craft were flashing red and white lights, not unlike an airplane. i studied it carefully until it flew upwards and quickly out of sight. it could have been manmade, but the speed and complete silence puzzle me. i saw a flying saucer once a few years ago and was glad to have a fellow witness this time for an event.
content.summary: Cigar/blimp shaped ufo spotted in bangor me
